name: market for diesel, burned in diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW | diesel, burned in diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12903/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'diesel, burned in diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;'diesel, burned in diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW' describes the use of a fossil fuel. It is used as a liquid fuel and is sourced from distillation of heavy oil. This exchange provides the service of burning 1 MJ of diesel in a diesel electric generating set. The services also includes (air) emissions, the production and provision of fuel and infrastructure. 1 MJ equals 0.0234 kg of diesel (LHV of diesel ca 42.8 MJ/kg).

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'diesel, burned in diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  diesel, burned in diesel-electric generating set, 18.5kW', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
